data.name: Trial of the Towers - Support Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Trial of the Towers is a free game. This Support Soundtrack is added DLC for those who wish to support Codeblade or listen to the music of Trial of the Towers.

Included Tracks:
01. Link by Link
02. Clash of the Keepers
03. Danger Dormant
04. Free from the Furnace

Songs will be placed in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Trial of the Towers\Soundtrack
